snippet: LEAD: After three years of study that was often derided, the California Task Force to Promote Self-Esteem and Personal and Social Responsibility has issued its final report, promoting Horatio Alger virtures, but clothing them in New Age terms....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: After three years of study that was often derided, the California Task Force to Promote Self-Esteem and Personal and Social Responsibility has issued its final report, promoting Horatio Alger virtures, but clothing them in New Age terms.

headline.main: California Journal;   A Study On Feelings Creates Bad Ones

byline.original: By KATHERINE BISHOP, Special to The New York Times
